perturbation.original_text: 2. Term.  The term of this Agreement shall commence on July 19, 1999 and shall    ----    thereafter continue until all above described Sponsor benefits are completed,    but in no event beyond the end of the 1999 season (the "Term").  This    Agreement is noncancellable by either party except for termination in    accordance with Paragraph 7, below, and may be mutually extended by written    agreement of the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: 2. Term.  The term of this Agreement shall commence on July 19, 1999 and shall    ----    thereafter continue until all above described Sponsor benefits are completed,    but in no event beyond the end of the 1999 season (the "Term").  This    Agreement is noncancellable by either party except for termination in    accordance with Paragraph 7, below. This agreement can be extended at the sole discretion of FNW with written agreement of the parties.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that the agreement may be mutually extended by written agreement of the parties. The modified text allows for FNW to extend the agreement at its sole discretion with written agreement from both parties. This creates uncertainty about the renewal terms and favors FNW.

perturbation.original_text: 5.2. Use of FNW and Seattle Seahawks Trademarks.  Sponsor shall not, by this         ------------------------------------------         Agreement, obtain any right, title or interest in the trade names or         trademarks of FNW, the Seattle Seahawks, the NFL, NFL Enterprises, L.P.,         NFL Properties, Inc. or any affiliate of such, nor shall any such         agreements give Sponsor the right to use, refer to, or incorporate in         marketing or other materials the names, logos, trademarks, designs,         identifications or copyrights of&bbsp;FNW, the Seattle Seahawks, the NFL, NFL         Enterprises, L.P., and NFL Properties, Inc. without the prior written         approval of FNW, which approval may be withheld in FNW's reasonable         discretion. Sponsor may use Seahawks trademarks for promotional purposes         as necessary to convey the Sponsor benefits described herein. However,         all such rights shall expire at the end of the 1999 regular season.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2. Use of FNW and Seattle Seahawks Trademarks.  Sponsor shall not, by this         ------------------------------------------         Agreement, obtain any right, title or interest in the trade names or         trademarks of FNW, the Seattle Seahawks, the NFL, NFL Enterprises, L.P.,         NFL Properties, Inc. or any affiliate of such, nor shall any such         agreements give Sponsor the right to use, refer to, or incorporate in         marketing or other materials the names, logos, trademarks, designs,         identifications or copyrights of&bbsp;FNW, the Seattle Seahawks, the NFL, NFL         Enterprises, L.P., and NFL Properties, Inc. without the prior written         approval of FNW, which approval may be withheld in FNW's reasonable         discretion. Sponsor may use Seahawks trademarks for promotional purposes. However, all such rights shall expire at the end of the 2000 regular season.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated Sponsor may use Seahawks trademarks for promotional purposes as necessary to convey the Sponsor benefits described herein. However, all such rights shall expire at the end of the 1999 regular season. The modified text removes the condition of Seahawks trademarks use for promotional purposes, and extends trademark rights to the end of the 2000 regular season. This could create confusion regarding the extent and duration of Sponsor's trademark rights. It also creates confusion regarding the purpose of the trademark for the duration of the initial 1999 season.

perturbation.original_text:
7. Termination.  FNW and Sponsor shall each have the right but not the    ----------- obligation to terminate this Agreement upon forty-five (45) days prior written notice, without further liability except as otherwise provided by this Paragraph 7 if any of the following shall occur:

            (a) Damage to or destruction of the Kingdome to the extent that the                 Kingdome is closed for a period of greater than thirty (30)                 days, in which case the refund provisions of this Paragraph 7                 shall apply.

            (b) The cancellation or termination of FNW's NFL franchise or the                 relocation of FNW's NFL franchise to a location more than 50                 miles from Seattle, Washington.

            (c) The other party materially defaults in the performance of its                 material obligations under this Agreement and such other party                 fails to correct such breach within thirty (30) days of written                 notice.

       If this Agreement is so terminated by Sponsor, Sponsor shall be entitled to a pro rata refund of any payments under this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
7. Termination.  FNW and Sponsor shall each have the right but not the    ----------- obligation to terminate this Agreement upon forty-five (45) days prior written notice, without further liability except as otherwise provided by this Paragraph 7 if any of the following shall occur:

            (a) Damage to or destruction of the Kingdome to the extent that the                 Kingdome is closed for a period of greater than thirty (30)                 days, in which case the refund provisions of this Paragraph 7                 shall apply.

            (b) The cancellation or termination of FNW's NFL franchise or the                 relocation of FNW's NFL franchise to a location more than 50                 miles from Seattle, Washington.

            (c) The other party materially defaults in the performance of its                 material obligations under this Agreement and such other party                 fails to correct such breach within thirty (30) days of written                 notice.

       If this Agreement is so terminated by Sponsor, Sponsor may be entitled to a pro rata refund of any payments under this Agreement at FNW's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text stated that If this Agreement is so terminated by Sponsor, Sponsor shall be entitled to a pro rata refund of any payments under this Agreement. The modified text changes shall be entitled to may be entitled to a pro rata refund of any payments under this Agreement at FNW's discretion. This makes the refund uncertain and dependent on FNW's decision, potentially disadvantaging the Sponsor.
